content.headline: The team
content.intro1: Who is part of your project? Add or remove additional team members here.
content.intro2: Team members are displayed on the project's detail page. They can view events in draft but cannot edit them.

add.headline: Add a team member
add.intro: Add an existing profile to your project here.
add.label: Name or email

current.headline: Current team members
current.intro: Here you can see all the team members at a glance.
